their mental health and levels of

what are some of the biggest challenges

change process so it's about cultural

to to know before it really happens that

the UK with
equity of attainment if you're a student

diminished we have to change that and

it's about integrating those those

second is to is is to set out a clear
view as to what's important for me
what's important is about teaching and

and then to give the students the
